MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML3 postcode area of Hamilton. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:35pm due to an unsafe situation within our excavation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:08pm on Monday, 11 January 2021
